tool.name: LifToGate v2.1.0
tool.description: Convert LIF documents to the GATE format.
tool.help:
**What it does**
Converts `LIF <http://wiki.lappsgrid.org/org.lappsgrid.serialization/groovydoc/org/lappsgrid/serialization/lif/Container.html>`_ to the `General Architecture for Text Engineering (GATE) <https://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/splitch5.html#x8-1000005.5.2>`_ format.
